titleStmt.title: The captives complaint, or, The prisoners plea against the burthensom and contentious title of tythes with a true relation of the prisoners spiritual progress, & travel towards the new and heavenly Jerusalem ...
titleStmt.author: Carleton, Tho. (Thomas)

notesStmt.note: Printed t.p. lacking; title information from contemporary ms. t.p.
